body.p:
State of Kentucky
Mercer County } affidavit

M. V. Bowen states on oath that he is the jailer of Mercer County, & has been such for more than one year last past. -- He states that Capt Jno. D Hale a few days after the charge of rescue of John Patterson was made against him, & a few days after the occurance & charge made, came with sd John Patterson and delivered him over to the civil authority of Mercer County Ky, and placed him in my custody as Jailer of Mercer County, & I released him and he was from thence taken to the Jail of Franklin County, & has been since bailed out with good & sufficient bail
Sworn to before me by M. V. Bowen this 20th June 1864.

J W Cardwell N. P.
Mercer Co Ky
